Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a financial transaction, either an expense or income.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Transaction entity.

date.description: The date when the transaction occurred.

amount.description: The amount of the transaction. Always positive.

tagIds.description: References to Tags. (Relationship: Tag N:N Transaction)

isRecurring.description: Indicates if the transaction is recurring.

creditCardId.description: Reference to CreditCard. (Relationship: CreditCard 1:N Transaction)  Null if not a credit card transaction.

installmentNumber.description: The installment number for the transaction. Null if not an installment.

totalInstallments.description: Total installments for the transaction. Null if not an installment.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category for classifying transactions.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Category entity.

Account.title: Account
Account.description: Represents a bank account or cash account.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Account entity.

balance.description: The current balance of the account.

Attachment.title: Attachment
Attachment.description: Represents an attachment for a transaction (e.g., a receipt image).

id.description: Unique identifier for the Attachment entity.

fileType.description: The type of the file (e.g., image/jpeg).

fileSize.description: The size of the file in bytes.

fileData.description: The file data encoded as a base64 string.

Tag.title: Tag
Tag.description: Represents a tag for grouping transactions.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Tag entity.
Unique identifier for the CreditCard entity.

name.description: The name of the credit card.

cardNumber.description: The credit card number.  Consider encrypting this field.

closingDate.description: The day of the month when the credit card bill closes.

dueDate.description: The day of the month when the credit card bill is due.

creditLimit.description: The credit limit of the card.

Budget.title: Budget
Budget.description: Represents a budget for a category.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Budget entity.

amount.description: The budgeted amount for the category.

startDate.description: The start date for the budget.

endDate.description: The end date for the budget.

id.description: Unique identifier for the FinancialGoal entity.

name.description: The name of the financial goal.

type.description: The type of the financial goal.

targetAmount.description: The target amount for the financial goal.

currentAmount.description: The current amount saved towards the goal.

monthlyContribution.description: The monthly contribution towards the goal.

targetDate.description: The target date for achieving the goal.

Report.title: Report
Report.description: Represents a financial report generated by the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Report entity.

startDate.description: The start date for the report data.

endDate.description: The end date for the report data.

data.description: The JSON data for the report, to be rendered by the frontend.

/users/{userId}/transactions/{transactio.description: Stores financial transactions for a user. Each transaction includes details such as amount, date, description, category, and account.

/users/{userId}/categories/{categoryId}.description: Stores categories for classifying transactions. Each category includes a name, description, and indication of whether it is for income or expenses.

/users/{userId}/accounts/{accountId}.description: Stores bank accounts or cash accounts for a user. Each account includes a name, description, and current balance.

/users/{userId}/attachments/{attachmentI.description: Stores attachments for transactions, such as receipt images. Each attachment includes a file name, file type, file size, and file data.

/users/{userId}/tags/{tagId}.description: Stores tags for grouping transactions. Each tag includes a name.

/users/{userId}/creditCards/{creditCardI.description: Stores credit cards for a user. Each credit card includes details such as name, card number, closing date, due date, credit limit, and available limit.

/users/{userId}/budgets/{budgetId}.description: Stores budgets for a user, related to specific categories. Each budget includes a category ID, amount, start date, and end date.

/users/{userId}/financialGoals/{financia.description: Stores financial goals for a user. Each financial goal includes a name, target amount, current amount, monthly contribution, and target date.

/users/{userId}/reports/{reportId}.description: Stores financial reports generated by a user. Each report includes a name, type, date range, and the report data.
